message.body: I've been walking lucky around - he's acting normal, drank a little, still no poop?
I thnk the banamine helped. I really think its gas. Up to you if u want to wait to call vet. I think I would wait, but u are there :) I will pay attention to him when I get home !! :)
He seems brighter now & wants to eat grass, so my inclination is to turn him out, wait & see how he is tomorrow morning? Think it's ok?
Yes, if you want to turn his group out go ahead so he's not alone. Or u can put him in the square if u rather he be alone and put the nortys out next to him. Whatever you want is fine with me :)
Ok, he pooped a normal poop and drank. I turned his bunch out, seems like everything's fine. Thanks for your help, see you tomorrow!
Great! Okeedokee! Hopefully he's over the hump. I'm going to tell Beth to bran mash him tomorrow am too, ok? Just to make sure
Sounds good, thanks. I'll be out after work unless something goes awry :)
Lucky is up and grazing ferociously this am, all good here! :) bran mash this am and probably back to normal for pm I think. I love banamine! :) have a good day!
